name: testName
description: Name of the laboratory test performed.
example: Albumin, Abs CD4, HIV-1 RNA RT-PCR Ultra, Hemoglobin

name: result
description: Result of the laboratory test. Can be numeric (e.g., '4.5') or special values ('<50', '>75,000', 'BLQ', 'ALQ').

name: units
description: Units that test are measured in at your cohort.
example: g/dL, THOU/uL, copies/mL, mMol/L, mg/dL, U/L

name: normalMin
description: Normal expected minimum value for this test. May be missing if not available.

params.message: If a normal minimum is not provided, we may ask for this information at a later date.

name: normalMax
description: Normal expected maximum value for this test. May be missing if not available.

params.message: If a normal maximum is not provided, we may ask for this information at a later date.

name: interpretation
description: Use to indicate an interpretation for the test result if appropriate. Also used to indicate CD4 cell count nadir and baseline HIV-1 RNA for historical data. BLQ = Below level of quantification (undetectable), ALQ = Above level of quantification.
example: High, Low, Normal, Abnormal, nadir, baseline, BLQ, ALQ

name: resultDate
description: Collection date of the laboratory test result.

name: source
description: Source of the laboratory test data.
